title: 104_s1998
content: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to enter into expedited negotiations with the Alaska Native Village Corporations of Tyonek Native Corporation, Chickaloon-Moose Creek Native Association, Inc. Ninilchik Native Association, Inc. and Knikatnu, Inc. to convey to the Village Corporations certain lands or interests in the Cook Inlet Region of the State of Alaska or other alternative financial consideration in partial fulfillment of the acreage entitlement of each Village Corporation under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act of 1971. Sets forth provisions concerning the inability to reach an agreement between the Secretary and a Village Corporation.
